body: And some random guy will pick her hat again, repeat.
Hope he leaves her and she becomes a single mother lmfao
Man, how can she be smiling like that, sheesh. I hope somebody will pick that hat. Since that hat seems like a magic word for "let me have your body"
I think this bitch will fuck with whoever pick her hat lol, as long you force her a little 😂

Quetz, that's the blonde haired guy at the end

Isn't that the husband at the start?
